name: Conflux Elemental
resistance: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
conimmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The elemental sheds bright light in a 50- foot radius and dim light for an additional 50 feet.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the elemental fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Mutable Form
traits.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Tempest Barrier
traits.desc: A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee or ranged attack while within 15 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage, 3 (1d6) fire damage, and 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Boulder Barrage (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The elemental launches a barrage of boulders at a point it can see within 60 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 10 or more is also knocked prone.

actions.name: Icy Pulse (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The elemental sends out a pulse of ice around its body. Each creature within 20 feet of the elemental must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) cold damage and having its speed reduced by 10 feet on its next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage and not slowed on a successful one. A creature that fails this save by 10 or more has a speed of 0 on its next turn instead.

actions.name: Flame Blades (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The elemental unleashes 3 blades of fire in separate 5-foot wide, 90-foot long lines. Each creature within one of these lines must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Summon Elemental Obelisks (1/Day)
actions.desc: The elemental summons 3 immobile obelisks in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet. These obelisks are medium objects with AC 15 and 20 hit points. Each of these have a small orb floating above them charged with elemental power – one cold, one fire, and one lightning. Until they are destroyed or the elemental killed, on initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), these orbs perform a ranged spell attack against a creature within 60 feet with a +7 bonus to hit. On a hit, that creature takes 10 (3d6) damage of the corresponding element type.

legendary.name: Touch
legendary.desc: The elemental makes a touch attack.

legendary.name: Elemental Onslaught (2 actions)
legendary.desc: The elemental uses its boulder barrage, icy pulse, or flame blades.
